nodes.text: The Government District was a region of Lonisa City on the planet Valo. During the High Republic Era, when Valo fell under attack from the Nihil, Jedi Padawan Ram Jomaram was arrested while attempting to alert the Starlight Beacon about the attack. When Jedi Knight Vernestra Rwoh and Padawan Lula Talisola arrived in response to a message Jomaram had sent, Rwoh sent Talisola to the Government District to find and release Jomaram.
